resources.string: Welcome to PokeBattler, let\'s test your skills!
Great to see you here. I\'m really curious how good your PokeSkills are. Let\'s find it out. Login or Register to get started
You need to enter both fields!
Something is wrong, check your password if it\'s long enough. Or maybe it\'s your email. Try again
You forgot your secret password or I don\'t know you!
It\'s time to discuss some juicy details
Try the pokedex or play a game, I hope you like it
